summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Denny Way from Westlake Avenue to Terry Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same with 5 inch plank to a width of 16 feet, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2430 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
